name: QuickBooks Online
natural_language_description: 这是 QuickBooks Online 节点。主要用于: Consume the QuickBooks Online API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: customer

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

VendorRef.name: VendorRef
VendorRef.description: The ID of the vendor who the bill is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
VendorRef.natural_language_description: 参数名: For Vendor Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the vendor who the bill is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

Line.name: Line
Line.description: Individual line item of a transaction
Line.natural_language_description: 参数名: Line | 作用: Individual line item of a transaction | 默认值: {}
available_options: Amount (值: None) - Monetary amount of the line item
Description (值: None) - Textual description of the line item
itemId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
LineNum (值: None) - Position of the line item relative to others
TaxCodeRef (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
Qty (值: None) - Number of units of the line item

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: Active (值: None) - Whether the employee is currently enabled for use by QuickBooks
Balance (值: None) - The balance reflecting any payments made against the transaction
PrintOnCheckName (值: None) - Name of the vendor as printed on a check
Vendor1099 (值: None) - Whether the vendor is an independent contractor, given a 1099-MISC form at the end of the year

billId.name: billId
billId.description: The ID of the bill to update
billId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bill ID | 作用: The ID of the bill to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: query (值: None) - The condition for selecting vendors. See the guide for supported syntax.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {} | (必填项)
available_options: Active (值: None) - Whether the employee is currently enabled for use by QuickBooks
Balance (值: None) - The balance reflecting any payments made against the transaction
PrintOnCheckName (值: None) - Name of the vendor as printed on a check
Vendor1099 (值: None) - Whether the vendor is an independent contractor, given a 1099-MISC form at the end of the year

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The display name of the vendor to create
displayName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Display Name | 作用: The display name of the vendor to create | (必填项)

customerId.name: customerId
customerId.description: The ID of the customer to update
customerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | 作用: The ID of the customer to update | (必填项)

employeeId.name: employeeId
employeeId.description: The ID of the employee to update
employeeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Employee ID | 作用: The ID of the employee to update | (必填项)

CustomerRef.name: CustomerRef
CustomerRef.description: The ID of the customer who the payment is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
CustomerRef.natural_language_description: 参数名: For Customer Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the customer who the payment is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

estimateId.name: estimateId
estimateId.description: The ID of the estimate to update
estimateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Estimate ID | 作用: The ID of the estimate to update | (必填项)

download.name: download
download.description: Whether to download estimate as PDF file
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download | 作用: Whether to download estimate as PDF file | 默认值: False | (必填项)

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name of the file that will be downloaded
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: Name of the file that will be downloaded | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the recipient of the payment
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email of the recipient of the payment | (必填项)

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.description: The ID of the invoice to update
invoiceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice ID | 作用: The ID of the invoice to update | (必填项)

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.description: The ID of the item to retrieve
itemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item ID | 作用: The ID of the item to retrieve | (必填项)

TotalAmt.name: TotalAmt
TotalAmt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Total Amount | 作用: Total amount of the transaction | 默认值: 0

paymentId.name: paymentId
paymentId.description: The ID of the payment to update
paymentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Payment ID | 作用: The ID of the payment to update | (必填项)

purchaseId.name: purchaseId
purchaseId.description: The ID of the purchase to retrieve
purchaseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Purchase ID | 作用: The ID of the purchase to retrieve | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

vendorId.name: vendorId
vendorId.description: The ID of the vendor to update
vendorId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Vendor ID | 作用: The ID of the vendor to update | (必填项)
